goldens.input: What information is required to login using the /auth/login endpoint?
goldens.expected_output: The /auth/login endpoint requires email and password.
The /auth/login endpoint returns a JWT token which expires in 24 hours.

goldens.input: What is the rate limit for login attempts on /auth/login?
goldens.expected_output: The rate limit for the /auth/login endpoint is 5 attempts per minute.

goldens.input: How can I refresh my JWT token?
goldens.expected_output: You can refresh your JWT token by making a POST request to /auth/refresh with a valid refresh_token.
The /auth/refresh endpoint returns a new JWT token.

goldens.input: How long does a refresh token last?
goldens.expected_output: A refresh token expires in 30 days.

goldens.input: How do I retrieve user profile data?
goldens.expected_output: You can retrieve user profile data by making a GET request to /auth/user with an Authorization header containing a valid JWT token.
The /auth/user endpoint returns user profile data.

goldens.input: What happens if I make more than 5 login attempts in one minute?
goldens.expected_output: If you make more than 5 login attempts in one minute, you will hit the rate limit and further attempts will be denied until the next minute.

goldens.input: What happens if the refresh token is used after 30 days?
goldens.expected_output: If the refresh token is used after 30 days, it will be expired and cannot be used to obtain a new JWT token.

goldens.input: Can I use the JWT token from /auth/login after 24 hours?
goldens.expected_output: No, the JWT token from /auth/login expires after 24 hours and cannot be used.

goldens.input: What happens if I try to access /auth/user without a valid JWT token in the Authorization header?
goldens.expected_output: If you try to access /auth/user without a valid JWT token in the Authorization header, you will be denied access.

goldens.input: What happens if I try to refresh my JWT token with an expired refresh token?
goldens.expected_output: If you try to refresh your JWT token with an expired refresh token, the request will fail as the refresh token is no longer valid.

goldens.input: What happens if I hit the rate limit on /auth/login and then immediately try to login again?
goldens.expected_output: If you hit the rate limit on /auth/login and try to login again immediately, your request will be denied until the rate limit resets after a minute.

goldens.input: What happens if I try to refresh my JWT token with a valid refresh token but without a valid JWT token in the Authorization header?
goldens.expected_output: The /auth/refresh endpoint does not require a JWT token in the Authorization header, only a valid refresh token is needed.
